abstract: The companies will allow TiVo owners who shop on Amazon’s digital download store to send films and TV shows to their broadband-connected TiVo machines.
snippet: The companies will allow TiVo owners who shop on Amazon’s digital download store to send films and TV shows to their broadband-connected TiVo machines.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Feb. 6 — Amazon.com, the online retail giant, and TiVo, pioneer of the digital video recorder, are teaming up to help downloaded movies and TV shows make the leap to television screens.

headline.main: Amazon and TiVo in Venture to Put Downloaded Videos on TV
headline.print_headline: Amazon and TiVo in Venture to Put Downloaded Videos on TV
